title: Getting a new PC! help!
body: Ive never gotten anything better than my AMD A12 1TB Hard drive, 6 gig ram, okay laptop, now im ready to do streaming, and take my gaming past league on high quality at a budget of 900. I have a decent grasp on processors, im picking out an I7 7700 3.6 ghz quad core. I have no idea what to do for a motherboard, im on part picker atm. Any help is good.

replies.body:
It's a little hard for us to really say for sure what you should get since everyone's needs are different. When you're looking for a pc for League, the simplest thing to do is to check the parts you're looking at against the [**minimum specs guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654).

However, if you had something specific in mind feel free to shoot those our way and we can let you know if they'll be good enough for League or not.
